Package me.itzloghotxd.pdk.gui

package me.itzloghotxd.pdk.gui
This package contains classes related to custom GUI implementations for Bukkit/Spigot plugins.

It includes the following classes:

  • AbstractInventory - An abstract class that provides a base structure for custom GUIs.
  • InventoryListener - A listener class that handles inventory-related events.

The AbstractInventory class implements InventoryHolder and provides methods for setting up an inventory, handling item placement, and responding to inventory click and close events. The InventoryListener class listens for InventoryClickEvent and InventoryCloseEvent, delegating the event handling to the corresponding AbstractInventory.

Author: ItzLoghotXD

  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AbstractInventory
    Represents an abstract inventory that provides a base structure for custom GUI implementations.
    InventoryListener
    Handles inventory-related events such as clicks and inventory closing.
